name: dqcai-blog-be
description: Blog API built with Fastify, TypeScript and MongoDB using @dqcai/mongodb library

scripts.build:assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); try{fs.cpSync('public', 'dist', {recursive:true, force:true}); console.log('‚úÖ Assets copied');}catch(e){console.log('‚ÑπÔ∏è No assets to copy or already exists');}"
scripts.clean:cross-platform: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); function rmrf(dir){if(fs.existsSync(dir)){fs.rmSync(dir,{recursive:true,force:true});}} rmrf('./dist'); rmrf('./build'); console.log('‚úÖ Clean completed');"
scripts.pre-release:check: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test && npm run build && echo '‚úÖ All pre-release checks passed'
scripts.release:manual: echo 'üöÄ Starting manual release process...' && git status --porcelain && echo 'Current branch:' && git branch --show-current && echo 'Ready for manual release. Follow the steps in README.md'
scripts.postversion: echo 'üì¶ Version updated to:' && npm pkg get version
scripts.release:status: echo 'Current branch:' && git branch --show-current && echo 'Version:' && npm pkg get version && echo 'Git status:' && git status --short
